import{Card,CardHeader,CardTitle,CardBody,CardText,Input,Label,Row,Col}from'reactstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InputSizes=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h4",children:"Sizing Options"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardText,{children:["Use ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"bsSize=\"sm / lg\""})," attribute with Input tag to change size of input."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:"12",className:"mb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{className:"form-label",for:"input-large",children:"Large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-large",bsSize:"lg",placeholder:"Large Input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:"12",className:"mb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{className:"form-label",for:"input-default",children:"Default"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-default",placeholder:"Default Input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:"12",className:"mb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{className:"form-label",for:"input-small",children:"Small"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-small",bsSize:"sm",placeholder:"Small Input"})]})]})]})]});};export default InputSizes;

sourcesContent: // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Input, Label, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const InputSizes = () => { return ( Sizing Options Use bsSize="sm / lg" attribute with Input tag to change size of input. ) } export default InputSizes
